@bowserjr2 wrote:

item.title: Ring of wealth! help please
item.dc:creator: @boi_jx boi_jx
item.description:
@boi_jx wrote:

IM LOOKING TO TRY AND FIGURE OUT HOW TO INCREASE THE WEALTHS CHANCE OF GETTING A RARE DROP AND CANT FIGURE IT OUT

ANYONE KNOW HOW TO CHANGE IT?
THIS IS THE CODE AND IVE TRIED ESSING WIH ALL THE NUMBERS IN THERE INCREASIN THEM AND DECREASING THEM BUT ITS JUST NOT INCREASING THE RARE DROP THANK YOU HOPE U CAN HELP

public boolean rareDrops(Client c, int i) {
int rarity = 0;
int ringOfWealth = 0;
int npcDropRate = ((Integer)NPCDrops.dropRarity.get(Integer.valueOf(npcs[i].npcType))).intValue();
if(c.playerEquipment[c.playerRing] == 2572 && npcDropRate-3 > 0) {
ringOfWealth = 1+Misc.random(2);
c.sendMessage(“Your ring of wealth helped your drop rate by @red@”+ringOfWealth+"@bla@%");
}
rarity = Misc.random(npcDropRate-ringOfWealth);

  return rarity == 0;

}

Read full topic
